effects: Increase resistance to all status effects by 50%
Cure all status effects after battle
name: Descendant of Moore
Descendant of Moore
慕亞的後裔
무어의 후예
Descendant de Muah
Muah-Nachkomme
Muano
desc_short: Boost poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone resistance, and cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone for self after battle
提高毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化耐性的數值+戰鬥結束時治療自身毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化狀態
독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력 상승+전투 종료 시 사용자의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 회복

Augmente la résistance au poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification, et soigne le lanceur de poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification après la bataille
Erhöht Resistenzen Gegen Gift, Blind, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein + heilt Gift, Blind, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein für sich selbst nach einem Kampf.
Aumenta la res. a ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie y cura ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie del usuario durante el combate
